stentry.ph: The SINGULAR is a kind of thing.

stentry.xref: SETTINGSSETTINGS are one or more key=value pairs, sparated by a comma. Use SETTINGS to customize the behavior of a command.

section.title: Settings

entry.xref: COMMANDA COMMAND is any ConTeXt command.
DIMENSIONA DIMENSION is an amount of linear distance. ConTeXt understands several units of measurement, and we can mix different units in the same document.

section.note: Inherits options from \vspacingThe \vspacing command inserts skip into the text block. Use keywords to indicate preset amounts of skip, or use dimensions to create spaces of arbitrary skip..

link.linktext: Command definition in the ConTeXt source file strc-flt.mkvi
